<h1 align="center">
  Gatsby Bootcamp based on Andrew Mead's video series on youtube
</h1>
<p>This is a simple blog that uses contentful https://app.contentful.com/ as its blog post source. Showing how you can use a simple react frontend with a nice admin backend for the user. </p>

Here is the link to the video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8t0vNu2fCCM

<p>You can find a live version of the app here: http://gatsby.artseemarketing.com</p>
